bibl.title: A Letter from the Archive of Dioscorus.
bibl.note: Refers to the animals of the deaconia of the monastery of Apa Apollôs, and to some landowners who wish to deduct the expenses from the Imperial revenue. Aphrodite, either after A.D. 573/4 or about A.D. 589/590.

bibl.title: Proceedings of the XVIII International Congress of Papyrology. II

bibl.seg: Hanafi Alia, A Letter from the Archive of Dioscorus.
Proceedings of the XVIII International Congress of Papyrology. II (Athens, 1988) pp. 91-106, 2 pll.

Refers to the animals of the deaconia of the monastery of Apa Apollôs, and to some landowners who wish to deduct the expenses from the Imperial revenue. Aphrodite, either after A.D. 573/4 or about A.D. 589/590.
